summary:
House for player - Multiple Adoption Version
Great space for collectors
Mannequins, display case, daggers,weapons and shields plaques, library, bedrooms, kitchen/bar, crafting, chests, all shrines, storage priest masks, etc ...
descriptionHtml:
[center][COLOR=#974806][I][FONT=Impact][SIZE=7]Stonewall_River V2_00 -
Multiple Adoptions Version[/SIZE][/FONT][/I][/COLOR][/center]

[center][B][SIZE=2][IMG]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/52208-3-1395169753.jpg[/IMG][/SIZE][/B][/center]

[center]Other mod:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29472]Stonewall Gaden V3[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30530]Stonewall Manor[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/51943]Stonewall River V1_00[/url][/center]

Description
===========
Stonewall_River is a mod for players who like (like me) collect all weapons and armor.
This is a "home" large enough to accommodate many mannequins, libraries, weapons racks and display cases for exposing everything.
Version Multiple Adoptions : possibility adopting 6 childrens

Mannequins: 122
Display Cases (weapons): 23
Display Cases (daggers): 32
Display Cases (books): 6
Weapon Plaques: 133
Plaques (2 weapons and Shield): 67
Libraries for 550 books
+ various chests
+ all for making
+ Merchants, Guards and NPCs

Requirements
===========
Hearthfire DLC

[center][COLOR=#00B050][SIZE=3]For adopting 6 children and for relocating to the house you also need load [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29249]Hearthfire Multiple Adoptions mod by TMPhoenix[/url][/SIZE][/COLOR][/center]
...
[center][COLOR=#E36C09][SIZE=3][FONT=Impact]Small quest to have the house key
[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR]Sorry, my NPCs are not dubbed ... so you have to put subtitles.[/center]

[center][COLOR=#953734][SIZE=4][B]English version and...
...Et version Française[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR][/center]

[center][SIZE=4]A courier shall come give you a note and small quest begins.
Un messager viendra vous donner une note et la quête commencera [/SIZE][/center]

Install
=======
Download with NMM
or
Copy the files Data : (install folder)Skyrim/Data

Stonewall_River.bsa
Stonewall_River.esp
Stonewall_River .ini

[B][SIZE=2]Warning: if you alreadyhad the Stonewall River V1.00 version withdraw all your belongingsfrom the house before changing mod.[/SIZE][/B]


Uninstall
=========
with NMM
or
Delete the files Data : (install folder)Skyrim/Data

Stonewall_River.bsa
Stonewall_River.esp
Stonewall_River .ini

Contact

sandysan
